original_title: Dear Dad: Letters from Same Gender Loving Sons
overview: A film that peeks into the lives of your friends, brothers, cousins, co-workers, sons, and uncles. You'll meet 8 diverse same gender loving men living in "Black Gay Mecca"; Atlanta, GA. The project aims to give same gender loving men a platform to tell their varying yet universal stories about their relationship with their father and how it has shaped them as men.
title: Dear Dad: Letters from Same Gender Loving Sons
